segment.source: Two major updates have been released since ACT 6.1.
segment.target: Two major updates have been released since ACT 6.1.

segment.source: Two major updates have been released since ACT 6.1.
segment.target: Two major updates have been released since ACT 6.1.

segment.source: They are ACT 6.1 Update and ACT 6.1 Update 2.
segment.target: They are ACT 6.1 Update and ACT 6.1 Update 2.

segment.source: The following table lists changes made in the Application Compatibility Toolkit (ACT), which is included in the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK) download.
segment.target: The following table lists changes made in the Application Compatibility Toolkit (ACT), which is included in the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK) download.

segment.source: Support for Windows 10, including viewing Windows 10 reports on Application Compatibility Manager.
segment.target: Support for Windows 10, including viewing Windows 10 reports on Application Compatibility Manager.

segment.source: Bug fixes: this version of ACT fixed an issue where Inventory-Collector package would fail when it tried to inventory the system.
segment.target: Bug fixes: this version of ACT fixed an issue where Inventory-Collector package would fail when it tried to inventory the system.

segment.source: Bug fixes: this version of ACT addresses the following bugs:
segment.target: Bug fixes: this version of ACT addresses the following bugs:

segment.source: Capability to create custom compatibility fixes for Windows versions other than the currently running version.
segment.target: Capability to create custom compatibility fixes for Windows versions other than the currently running version.

segment.source: Fixed issue where Inventory-Collector Package crashes when running on some Windows 7 x86 systems.
segment.target: Fixed issue where Inventory-Collector Package crashes when running on some Windows 7 x86 systems.

segment.source: Fixed issue where not specifying a tag for Inventory-Collector Package would cause an error in the log processing service.
segment.target: Fixed issue where not specifying a tag for Inventory-Collector Package would cause an error in the log processing service.

segment.source: The result of this bug was that data collected by the Package would not be processed.
segment.target: The result of this bug was that data collected by the Package would not be processed.

segment.source: Fixed issue where Standard User Analyzer (SUA) returns an error when trying to apply mitigations to an app on Windows 7.
segment.target: Fixed issue where Standard User Analyzer (SUA) returns an error when trying to apply mitigations to an app on Windows 7.

segment.source: Fixed issue where ACT is unable to create custom compatibility fixes for 32-bit systems correctly.
segment.target: Fixed issue where ACT is unable to create custom compatibility fixes for 32-bit systems correctly.

segment.source: The version numbers for ACT 6.1 Update and Update 2 are identical, so you will need to look at the product ID of ACT to tell them apart.
segment.target: The version numbers for ACT 6.1 Update and Update 2 are identical, so you will need to look at the product ID of ACT to tell them apart.

segment.source: To find the product ID, open ACT, go to HelpAbout, and compare the product ID to the following list.
segment.target: To find the product ID, open ACT, go to HelpAbout, and compare the product ID to the following list.

segment.source: If you run into any of the bugs fixed in Update 2, you likely have ACT 6.1 Update or older.
segment.target: If you run into any of the bugs fixed in Update 2, you likely have ACT 6.1 Update or older.

segment.source: Please download the latest version in the Windows ADK.
segment.target: Please download the latest version in the Windows ADK.
